stems: leave a great deal to be desired
leave a lot to be desired

vrs.va: leave a lot to be desired
leave a great deal to be desired

dt: used to say that something is not very good at all or is not close to being good enough

dt.t: Your work {it}leaves much to be desired{/it}.
Although her education {it}left a great deal to be desired{/it}, she was an extremely intelligent person.
The working conditions here {it}leave a lot to be desired{/it}.

shortdef: —used to say that something is not very good at all or is not close to being good enough
